author: wsjcom
title: Spirit AeroSystems to Buy Asco Industries Parent for $650 Million
text:
Aircraft-parts manufacturer Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc. has reached a deal to buy the parent of a Belgian aerospace-components maker for $650 million in cash.
Spirit said Wednesday it is buying S.R.I.F. NV, which is the parent of Asco Industries NV, a Belgium-based privately held designer and manufacturer of components and assemblies for the aerospace industry.
